headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Moderna Soars on Bird Flu Vaccine Potential
summary: The S&P 500 fell 1.1% on Tuesday, Jan. 7, as U.S. manufacturing data reinvigorated concerns about inflation and the interest rate outlook.

headline: Moderna, BioNTech, Novavax Surge After CDC Reports Two-Week Covid Spike
summary: Moderna stock surged Tuesday after the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention noted a two-week spike in positive Covid tests.

headline: Health Care Up as Vaccine Makers Surge -- Health Care Roundup
summary: Health-care companies rose as a reported U.S. death from bird flu stoked fears of a new pandemic, boosting shares of vaccine makers. Moderna rose by more than 12%, while Novavax and CureVac also...

headline: Moderna Stock Soars After First US Bird-Flu Death
summary: Moderna led S&P 500 gainers Tuesday, a day after the first bird-flu death was reported in the U.S. The biotech company is developing a vaccine for H5N1.

raw.headline: Moderna Stock Soars After First US Bird-Flu Death
raw.summary: Moderna led S&P 500 gainers Tuesday, a day after the first bird-flu death was reported in the U.S. The biotech company is developing a vaccine for H5N1.

headline: Moderna Stock Jumps Amid Bird Flu Vaccine Hope After First U.S. Death
summary: The company is one of a few drugmakers currently developing a vaccine for the illness, which is spreading rapidly through North America.

headline: Vaccine Stocks Surge: Moderna Jumps 11% as COVID-19 and Flu Fears Reignite Immunization Demand
summary: Moderna leads vaccine rally amid rising respiratory infections, spurring investment in COVID-19, flu, and RSV solutions.

headline: Why Vaccine Stocks, Lucid (LCID) Are Rallying
summary: Vaccine stocks and EV maker Lucid Technologies (LCID) are among today’s biggest winners today. Vaccine makers, including Moderna (MRNA), Novavax (NVAX), and BioNTech (BNTX), are rallying after the first U.S. death from bird flu was announced yesterday. Meanwhile, Lucid’s shares are climbing for a second straight day after the EV company reported higher-than-expected fourth-quarter deliveries […]
